pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: These images show a scenic aerial view of a winding road atop a rocky cliff, overlooking a wide river and expansive landscape. The area is characterized by dramatic cliffs, sparse vegetation, and sweeping vistas. The video captures the natural beauty and grandeur of the location.
